description: This file defines a reusable Button component in React with customizable variants and sizes, utilizing the class-variance-authority library for styling variants and TypeScript for type safety.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A React forwardRef component that renders a customizable button element with support for variants, sizes, and asChild rendering pattern.

methods.name: Button
methods.description: A React component that renders a button or Slot component, applying styling classes based on variant and size props.
